charaepi_ch0259_00_sania/2301_1101_0100_:
As [Name:PlayerNickname ] was walking
through town, [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ] saw Sonia and Bianca
in the middle of a battle.
charaepi_ch0259_00_sania/2301_1201_0200_: What? That’s your plan? If so, then...
charaepi_ch0259_00_sania/2301_1201_0600_: Thanks for battling me. It was fun!
charaepi_ch0259_00_sania/2301_1201_0700_:
The pleasure was all mine! I’m so happy I got to
battle with you, Professor Sonia!
charaepi_ch0259_00_sania/2301_1201_0800_:
The way you attacked at first was really hard for
my Musharna to deal with. I was really feeling
the pressure!
charaepi_ch0259_00_sania/2301_1201_0900_:
Ha ha... Well, your Musharna sure recovered from
that quickly enough...
charaepi_ch0259_00_sania/2301_1201_1000_:
Oh, I just can’t wait to battle with you again, and
maybe we could even talk about all the latest
Pokémon research!
charaepi_ch0259_00_sania/2301_1201_1100_:
Yeah, of course! I’ll get in touch with you
again soon!
charaepi_ch0259_00_sania/2301_1201_1300_:
Aah! You really caught me in an embarrassing
moment. How long have you been there?
charaepi_ch0259_00_sania/2301_1201_1800_:
If you were watching, then you must’ve noticed
that I’m not exactly in top form.
charaepi_ch0259_00_sania/2301_1201_1900_:
I’ve been wanting to do some serious Pokémon
battling ever since I came to Pasio. Things haven’t
been going too well, though.
charaepi_ch0259_00_sania/2301_1201_2000_:
I’ve learned a lot about Pokémon since I got here,
so you’d think that I’d be doing better. Truth is,
though, I’m not.
charaepi_ch0259_00_sania/2301_1201_2100_:
Take Yamper, for example. I’ve spent so much
time researching them, and I know loads about
them now.
charaepi_ch0259_00_sania/2301_1201_2200_:
So why haven’t Yamper and I been in sync? Did
you notice anything during our battle just then?
charaepi_ch0259_00_sania/2301_0402_2600_:
Hm... Now that you mention it, I think you might
be on to something. But why?
charaepi_ch0259_00_sania/2301_1201_2800_:
I get it now! I’ve got to stop thinking about the
Yamper in the Pokédex and start thinking about
my Yamper right here in front of me!
charaepi_ch0259_00_sania/2301_1201_2900_:
I was so caught up in Pokémon research that I
wasn’t paying attention to my actual Pokémon.
charaepi_ch0259_00_sania/2301_1201_3000_: No wonder we couldn’t get in sync.
charaepi_ch0259_00_sania/2301_1201_3100_:
Yeah, that makes perfect sense! Ha! Now I feel
like I could take on anyone and win!
charaepi_ch0259_00_sania/2301_1201_3200_: So whaddya say? Wanna have a battle?
charaepi_ch0259_00_sania/2301_1201_3400_:
Oh my. You’re not in the mood to battle, are you.
You just want to play. I almost messed up again!
Sorry, Yamper.
charaepi_ch0259_00_sania/2301_1201_3500_:
Watching Yamper play brings back memories from
the Gym Challenge back in Galar.
charaepi_ch0259_00_sania/2301_1201_3600_:
Back then, there was a young boy who went
around with me and did the Challenge.
charaepi_ch0259_00_sania/2301_1201_3700_:
And where’s that little boy now? Now they call
him “Leon, the unbeatable Champion.”
charaepi_ch0259_00_sania/2301_1201_3800_:
Looking at you, I get a similar sort of feeling. You
might just become a Champion, too!
charaepi_ch0259_00_sania/2301_0401_4000_:
You’ve definitely got the same sense of confidence
that Leon has!
charaepi_ch0259_00_sania/2301_0402_4200_:
That’s the spirit! I suppose if I’m gonna aim high,
I might as well aim for the stars!
charaepi_ch0259_00_sania/2301_1201_4300_:
Anyway, thanks for reminding me of those good
old days! I certainly won’t be giving up on my
dreams any time soon!
